name: Debra Eaton
summary: Highly skilled and experienced educator with a strong background in information technology. Adept at addressing the needs of a variety of learners and administrators. Strongly knowledgeable about all approaches to distance learning.

experience.title: E-LEARNING DESIGNER
experience.description: Led design, development and project management of education teams for 501(r) regulatory compliance curriculum; developed learning objectives, content analysis, storyboarding, interactive design, testing, scheduling, instructional design and development. Also led initiatives for Patient Safety with similar scope; analysed and tested e-learning processes for new LMS and authoring tools (pretest, posttest, curriculum, SCORM, feedback surveys); designed and implemented SharePoint training resources and knowledge center; created How-To videos for SharePoint video channel.

experience.title: INSTRUCTIONAL DESIGNER
experience.description: Gathered requirements, managed budgets, designed and developed curriculum; managed eLearning and ILT delivery; planned and executed US and international training; measured training effectiveness; integrated technology; ensured quality content; applied instructional pedagogy and adult learning theories; used eLearning authoring tools and techniques.

experience.title: TRAINER
experience.description: Designed, developed, authored, delivered and implemented training for data and security software; project managed with stakeholders and subject matter experts; created learning objectives, content and assessments; designed courses for classroom, web, print, conferences; managed proposals, schedules, resources and tasks; served as editor, subject matter expert, class manager, trainer and class administrator.

education.degree: Master of Science in Instructional Design and Technology
Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Facilities Planning and Management
